events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests money back for a purchased item.
Assigning the case to Agent Lisa, who handles refund requests and exchanges.
Hello! I’m Lisa from customer support, and I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket has not been worn, and it’s still in the original packaging as it arrived.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your refund request and you will receive your money back within 5 to 7 business days.
Great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the easy refund process and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund case is now closed from our side as the refund has been successfully initiated. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
This case has been closed successfully after confirmation of refund receipt and positive customer feedback.
